recipe_overview.description: Deploys Penpot, the open-source design and prototyping platform for product teams. This service provides functionality similar to Figma and is not hardware-intensive. The recipe also supports connecting to a remote Penpot instance.
deliverables: Configuration for connecting to a local or remote Penpot instance.

tasks.title: Deploy Penpot Stack
tasks.description: Deploys the complete Penpot stack (frontend, backend, exporter) using the official Docker Compose file. Provides an option to configure a remote instance URL.
acceptance_criteria: The 'config/design_services/penpot_config.yml' is created, allowing a user to specify a remote_url.
